original_text:
If only I had never come into being,
    or had been carried straight from the womb to the grave!
korean_text: 있어도 없던 것 같이 되어서 태에서 바로 무덤으로 옮겨졌으리이다

sentences.original_text: If only I had never come into being
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 결코 존재하지 않았더라면 좋았을 것을

sentences.original_text: or had been carried straight from the womb
